sprint_goal: Establish the core, secure Jint transformation engine and sandboxing capabilities. This provides the foundational backend for all subsequent features.
Implement the backend and basic UI for secure script management with versioning, and put the feature behind a feature flag.
Build the rich script development and preview experience, including the Monaco editor and the 3-pane preview UI with live data testing.
Add advanced features and operational readiness, including data validation, version history UI, and Prometheus monitoring.
